markdownRemark.html: Represents a Form validation error message. Only renders when the value that it is for is invalid.

A function that maps an array of message strings and returns a renderable string or ReactElement.

<Message>
 {errors => errors.join(', ')}
</Message>
Map the passed in message object for the field to a string to display

tsType.name: signature
tsType.raw: (item: any, i?: number, list?: any[]) => boolean
